name: Brainybear AI Chatbot
author: Brainybear

sections.description:
Train AI Chatbots in 3 Clicks. Help Customers Instantly.

Build AI Chatbots in 3 Steps and Train in 3 Clicks. Brainybear scans your website or uploaded files to deliver quick, accurate AI answers to customer queries.

Plugin Features

  • Embed Brainybear AI chatbot

Advanced Features (available on brainybear.ai for free)

  • Create and customize AI chatbot
  • Train AI chatbot with uploaded content
  • Train AI chatbot with website content
  • Train AI chatbot with filed from Google Drive or Notion
  • Integration with WhatsApp
  • Integration with Facebook Messenger
  • Integration with Telegram
  • Integration with Slack

Third party services

This plugin will connect to Brainybear backend API in order to identify user ID as well as fetching the correct assistant.

The API being called is: https://api.brainybear.ai/user/wp-api?key=YOUR_API_KEY

Read more about the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy about third party links.
sections.installation:
Extract the zip file and just drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation and then activate the Plugin from Plugins page.

After active plugin go to Brainybear->Settings to setup your API key.
sections.faq:
Is there a free plan available?

Yes, free plan is available, our forever free plan comes with 50 free message credits every month. You can sign up for a free account here.

What are AI Assistants?

AI Assistants are AI-powered chat assistant that support your customers based on the knowledge they have been trained with. Set up in 3 simple steps, train with just 3 clicks, and deploy a knowledgeable AI chat assistant ready to engage your customers like never before.

How do I install Brainybear AI assistant?

Installation involves copy and pasting a code snippet within the site. Weâ€™ve created guides to help you install the chatbot on WordPress, Shopify, Wix, Webflow, ClickFunnels, SquareSpace, Unbounce, Weebly or Google tag manager.

Can I integrate Brainybear AI assistant to other messenging apps?

Yes, with configurable integrations into platforms like Facebook Messenger, WhatsApp, Telegram, Slack, our chatbot becomes a flexible extension of your existing toolkit.
